annotation.spannedText: Do not drink tap water in China

classMention.mentionClass: Do not drink tap water in China

annotation.spannedText: The side effects of the vaccines are pretty minor

classMention.mentionClass: The side effects of the vaccines are pretty minor

annotation.spannedText: The side effects of contracting any of these illnesses is certainly more problematic

classMention.mentionClass: The side effects of contracting any of these illnesses is certainly more problematic

annotation.spannedText: The decision on vaccines should be made in consultation with your doctor

classMention.mentionClass: The decision on vaccines should be made in consultation with your doctor

annotation.spannedText: If someone at a travel clinic recommends the Yellow fever vaccine to you for your visit to China - leave

classMention.mentionClass: If someone at a travel clinic recommends the Yellow fever vaccine to you for your visit to China - leave

annotation.spannedText: If they're not live you can't get sick from them

classMention.mentionClass: If they're not live you can't get sick from them

annotation.spannedText: even for the live vaccinations the risk of getting sick from it is absolutely miniscule unless you're immunosuppressed

classMention.mentionClass: even for the live vaccinations the risk of getting sick from it is absolutely miniscule unless you're immunosuppressed

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinations don't prevent you from getting sick from everything, they prevent you from getting that particular illness

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinations don't prevent you from getting sick from everything, they prevent you from getting that particular illness

annotation.spannedText: CDC website is very good

classMention.mentionClass: CDC website is very good

annotation.spannedText: Don't go to any travel clinic, find a good one

classMention.mentionClass: Don't go to any travel clinic, find a good one

annotation.spannedText: Most immunizations have effective titer rise within 2 weeks

classMention.mentionClass: Most immunizations have effective titer rise within 2 weeks

annotation.spannedText: The Hepatitis A vaccine is good even if you don't travel

classMention.mentionClass: The Hepatitis A vaccine is good even if you don't travel

annotation.spannedText: It protects you from food borne hepatitis just from eating at a local restaurant or consuming contaminated fruit/produce

classMention.mentionClass: It protects you from food borne hepatitis just from eating at a local restaurant or consuming contaminated fruit/produce

annotation.spannedText: Tetanus now also contains a component to protect you against Pertussis

classMention.mentionClass: Tetanus now also contains a component to protect you against Pertussis

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who doesn't know how long it's been since their last tetanus shot should get it updated regardless of travel plans

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who doesn't know how long it's been since their last tetanus shot should get it updated regardless of travel plans

annotation.spannedText: Depending on the organism causing the diarrhea, trying to stop the diarrhea can make the infection worse

classMention.mentionClass: Depending on the organism causing the diarrhea, trying to stop the diarrhea can make the infection worse

annotation.spannedText: Not all traveler's diarrhea should be treated with Imodium or similar anti-diarrheal

classMention.mentionClass: Not all traveler's diarrhea should be treated with Imodium or similar anti-diarrheal

annotation.spannedText: Talk to you doctor or travel clinic about when you should or should not use an anti-diarrheal

classMention.mentionClass: Talk to you doctor or travel clinic about when you should or should not use an anti-diarrheal

annotation.spannedText: Not all diarrhea is treated the same except it is always important to keep well hydrated and keep up with fluid loss- not just water but any broth, clear liquids

classMention.mentionClass: Not all diarrhea is treated the same except it is always important to keep well hydrated and keep up with fluid loss- not just water but any broth, clear liquids

annotation.spannedText: the side effects of anti-malarials are not nearly as scary as the impact of contracting malaria

classMention.mentionClass: the side effects of anti-malarials are not nearly as scary as the impact of contracting malaria

annotation.spannedText: The most prudent thing to do in Asia is to do whatever is possible to avoid mosquito bites

classMention.mentionClass: The most prudent thing to do in Asia is to do whatever is possible to avoid mosquito bites

annotation.spannedText: Bring repellant and use it generously

classMention.mentionClass: Bring repellant and use it generously

annotation.spannedText: take a lot of precautions about what you put into your mouth

classMention.mentionClass: take a lot of precautions about what you put into your mouth

annotation.spannedText: China is safe, but do take reasonable precautions

classMention.mentionClass: China is safe, but do take reasonable precautions

annotation.spannedText: Common sense is the biggest factor

classMention.mentionClass: Common sense is the biggest factor

annotation.spannedText: shots/pills are a good precaution to have in any event, no matter where you are in the world, due to possible food contamination

classMention.mentionClass: shots/pills are a good precaution to have in any event, no matter where you are in the world, due to possible food contamination

annotation.spannedText: Our MD

classMention.mentionClass: Our MD

annotation.spannedText: get whatever vaccines that you should have for your age anyway

classMention.mentionClass: get whatever vaccines that you should have for your age anyway

annotation.spannedText: get the vaccines advised by the CDC for the specific cities you are visiting

classMention.mentionClass: get the vaccines advised by the CDC for the specific cities you are visiting

annotation.spannedText: since they do have side effects, don't take them unnecessarily

classMention.mentionClass: since they do have side effects, don't take them unnecessarily

annotation.spannedText: Only drink bottled water or other bottled drinks, drinks made with boiled water (coffee, tea) or alcoholic beverages

classMention.mentionClass: Only drink bottled water or other bottled drinks, drinks made with boiled water (coffee, tea) or alcoholic beverages

annotation.spannedText: if your guide says it is OK, trust him/her and have a good time enjoying local cuisine

classMention.mentionClass: if your guide says it is OK, trust him/her and have a good time enjoying local cuisine

annotation.spannedText: If possible, don't touch the railings on busses, staircases, etc

classMention.mentionClass: If possible, don't touch the railings on busses, staircases, etc

annotation.spannedText: wash hands, wash hands, use hand sanitizer, etc

classMention.mentionClass: wash hands, wash hands, use hand sanitizer, etc

annotation.spannedText: don't let your fears get in the way of your enjoyment

classMention.mentionClass: don't let your fears get in the way of your enjoyment

annotation.spannedText: Bottled water for everything is a must, as is (sadly) avoiding street food

classMention.mentionClass: Bottled water for everything is a must, as is (sadly) avoiding street food
